oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-12-19 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 19, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers the Jordanaires with Marijohn Wilkin and Millie Kirkham, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones and Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1054th broadcast, and the 21st Christmas show.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Faron Young; Jordanaires; Marijohn Wilkin; Millie Kirkham; Grandpa Jones; Ramona Jones; George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces the Jordanaires -- Silver Bells (Jordanaires, Marijohn Wilkin, Millie Kirkham) -- George Morgan introduces Grandpa Jones -- Jingle Bells (Grandpa Jones, Ramona Jones) -- Grant Turner and George Morgan talk -- Silent Night (George Morgan, cast) -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
